entities.description: The perception of how many students in the respondent's grade drink alcohol.
The perception of how many students in the respondent's grade get drunk at least once a week.
Frequency with which the respondent's parents check if they have done their homework in the past 12 months.
Frequency with which the respondent's parents help them with homework in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates the perception of alcohol consumption among students in the same grade.
Relates the perception of frequent drunkenness among students in the same grade.
Indicates the frequency with which parents checked if the homework was done.
Indicates the frequency with which parents helped with homework.
